com.deltadna.android.sdk

Class Product<T extends Product<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deltadna.android.sdk.Product<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JsonParams

    public class Product<T extends Product<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements JsonParams
    Constructs a product, to be used in conjunction with a Transaction.

      • setRealCurrency

        public T setRealCurrency(java.lang.String type,
                         int amount)
        Set a real currency for the product.
        Parameters:
        type - type of the currency, using an ISO-4217 3 character currency code
        amount - amount of the currency, using the minor currency unit
        Returns:
        this T instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the type is null or empty
        See Also:
        convertCurrency(DDNA, String, float)

      • convertCurrency

        public static int convertCurrency(DDNA ddna,
                                  java.lang.String code,
                                  float value)
        Converts a currency in a floating point format with a decimal point, such as '1.23' EUR, into an integer representation which can be used with setRealCurrency(String, int). This method will also work for currencies which don't use a minor currency unit, for example such as the Japanese Yen (JPY).
        Parameters:
        ddna - the SDK instance
        code - the ISO 4217 currency code
        value - the currency value to convert
        Returns:
        the converted integer value
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if ddna is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if code is null or empty
